Trooper:

"YEs sir... if you let me..."said the trooper doubing"The femme c=
ould be usefel, even if she refuses; you see, perhaps if we erase her memor=
ies until she arrived here and set her in stasis... we could gave her to Pa=
cificus Maximals or even Silver wings... If we instal a chip, she could hel=
p us to spy those factions and that would let us crush them or in case that=
 situation is needed, she could be a lil gift of peace to other Maximal fac=
tion but her presence here must be hidden...."
  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Nic 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 16, 2=
005 10:14 AM
  Subject: Re: Balistica up and running


  Jotunn: This is su=
rprising news indeed... Here are my orders: install
  a Loyalty chip in thi=
s Windlord. He must be brought under my control!
  After that, activate him=
. He will still think he is a maximal, but he
  will think our option is th=
e best one. Try to make him convert
  Balistica. If she doesn't join... ter=
minate her. Understood?

  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly200=
2@h...> wrote:
  > Trooper:
  > 
  > "YEs sir"replied the male while he loo=
ked those scary red eyes"One
  of the maximals, the somehow useless, it's a=
 femme, her name is
  Balistica., I'm not very clear with her backgroud: it=
 seems that she
  came her behind someone very important in Cybertron counc=
il; she's
  actually, funcional and under a high vigilance;  I don't like t=
hat she
  go around and lost. The other one is a male; his current status i=
s
  stasis lock, I guess that it's the best, sir, but he has a tight
  vigi=
lance too. Acording with data banks that was taken from the ruins
  from he=
 comes, his name is Windlord and was here before that the lost
  ones come =
to this planet and his joined them, and he participates in
  most battles b=
efore our arrival, in his data banks showed that he an a
  femme were Unicr=
on's prisioners, but they ran away, after that his
  records are destroyed.=
..  "
  >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   From: Nic 
  >   To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
  >   Sent: Friday, July 15, 2005 5:46 PM
  >   Subject: =
Re: Balistica up and running
  > 
  > 
  >   The room was dark. The air was=
 damp, as if there was a jungle in it.
  >   Yet, at the same time, there w=
as a chilling breeze passing through the
  >   room. Then, something moved,=
 and two huge red eyes were looking at the
  >   trooper.
  > 
  >   Jotunn=
: Tell me more... What are their names, and which is which? What
  >   is t=
heir potential? Answer me...
